title: My game didn't load after champ select and everyone else was in game
body: I have experienced this problem multiple times. What happened was I picked my champion, locked in, then proceeded to watch the video I was watching but then when I return to the game 5 minutes later because the game did not load I was at the home screen with all the news while everyone else was in game. This happened to me multiple times and I ended up getting low priority queue. Rito please tend to this issue.

replies.body:
Based on your context, it sounds like your connection to our servers is not quite getting you in-game. You may not be able to make a solid link to our gameservers due to certain conflicting network settings, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

Please let me know if those steps caused any changes for you.
Everything is working fine now, It was just that one time where the problem occurred. Thanks for the help
